items.content_html: Swarm.js is a Node.js implementation of OpenAI‚Äôs experimental Swarm framework. This SDK allows developers to orchestrate multi-agent systems using OpenAI‚Äôs API in a lightweight and ergonomic way, while leveraging Node.js for building scalable, real-world applications.

items.content_html: Implementation of MQTT protocol over TCP, designed for web applications. Built with TypeScript, this MQTT client allows for efficient message queuing and lightweight messaging between devices. It supports core MQTT functionalities, including PUBLISH, SUBSCRIBE, and acknowledgment handling, making it suitable for real-time applications.
items.title: DiogoCunhaCardoso/MQQT-Client: Implementation of MQTT protocol over TCP, designed for web applications. Built with TypeScript, this MQTT client allows for efficient message queuing and lightweight messaging between devices. It supports core MQTT functionalities, including PUBLISH, SUBSCRIBE, and acknowledgment handling, making it suitable for real-time applications.

items.content_html: Authify is a lightweight authentication library designed for MERN (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js) applications. It provides an easy-to-use solution for implementing JWT-based authentication, user session management, and middleware integration to secure your APIs.
items.title: Ghulam-Ali-Khan/Authify: Authify is a lightweight authentication library designed for MERN (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js) applications. It provides an easy-to-use solution for implementing JWT-based authentication, user session management, and middleware integration to secure your APIs.
